frame.name: Artistic_style
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains LUs that express the <fen>Form</fen> which a piece of <fen>Artwork</fen> represents. The <fen>Form</fen> may also represent the entire body of an <fen>Artist</fen>'s work. The <fen>Form</fen> may be further characterized by the <fen>Time</fen> of some <fen>Artwork</fen>'s creation or other <fen>Descriptor</fen>s.
<ex><fex name="Artist">Her</fex> <fex name="Form"><t>style</t></fex> <fex name="Artwork">of painting</fex> is an excellent blend of traditional and modern.</ex> <ex>The <fex name="Descriptor">whimsical</fex> <fex name="Form"><t>style</t></fex> <fex name="Artwork">of this piece</fex> is very effective.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Artist
FE.definition: <def-root>A person who creates an <fen>Artwork</fen> with a particular recognizable <fen>Form</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Artwork
FE.definition: <def-root>A created artifact that is created by an <fen>Artist</fen> and has a unique <fen>Form</fen> as perceived by some judge.</def-root>

FE.name: Form
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Form</fen> is a style that characterizes an <fen>Artwork</fen> (or an <fen>Artist</fen>, metonymically) and can be recognized by a judge. This FE is usually incorporated into the target for nouns in this frame.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of when the <fen>Artwork</fen> was created.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>A characterization of the <fen>Form</fen> that the <fen>Artwork</fen> resembles.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: style.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a general form that an artwork resembles

lexUnit.name: sound.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a style of a piece of music

lexUnit.name: look.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a style of a fashon designer

lexUnit.name: order.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a style of classical architechture
